Reviews.Title: Canon camera
Reviews.Author: ROBIN HALEY
Reviews.Content: Great  digital camera. I got this for my 16 yr old.  Lots of scene modes and accessories. Takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Was very pleased when I opened the package.
Reviews.Author: Nuffymom
Reviews.Content: This is a Birthday gift for my husband and it is a wonderful by.  He wanted a simple point and shot as mine is a bit complicated and this fits the bill.  All the accessories came just as advertised and took all the guess work out of this gift.  Couldn't find a better price and I looked all over the net.  All in all couldn't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: I really like it
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: A great camera for the money. it came with a kit of all kinds of thing, a case and memory card cleaning kit and two stands.

Reviews.Title: Very happy boys
Reviews.Author: phire
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my grandsons for Christmas. They have been very interested in taking pictures. They both loved it!

Reviews.Title: Lacks in Sharpness
Reviews.Author: Linda L. Clotiaux
Reviews.Content: I have not had good pictures with this camera. Most is not clear and sharp as they should be. It lacks quality.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for beginners
Reviews.Author: S. Ryker
Reviews.Content: Came with lots of good accessories. It is a good starting kit for anyone that wants to experiment with a camera, specially a child.

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: TRAVIS HOLLIDAY
Reviews.Content: Havent got to use it yet but I know it is a great camera because I have one and this was a great deal with everything it comes with.

Reviews.Title: Owners Manual
Reviews.Author: charles eakin
Reviews.Content: Camera does not come with an owners manual.  After a number of unsuccessful attempts to download a manual from their miserable website I gave up in disgust and contacted them.  Even with their detailed step by step instructions, I was unable to get their miserable website to give up that manual.  Contacting them again, they expressed their regrets over my trouble with obtaining an online manual for my camera.  They hoped I would understand that shipping this camera without an instruction book was their way of contributing to the green movement.  If I knew how to use this camera, I would send them a picture of a few wasted trees puked up by my printer in the form of paper wasted trying to use their miserable website.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.7-inch TFT color LCD with wide-viewing angle monitor
16.0 megapixel 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor
DIGIC 4 image processor for exceptional performance
5x optical zoom with 28mm wide-angle lens delivers stunning images
Shoot brilliant 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot A2500 16.0 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 16GB SD HC Memory Card + Point & Shoot Camera Case + Focus Universal Memory Card Reader + Accessory Kit
